trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> i <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> kierowane zdarzenia, a także powiązane dołączony i Podgląd zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Ten delegat jest używany z następujących zdarzeń dołączonych:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>Ten delegat jest również używany z następujących kierowane zdarzenia na podstawowych elementów.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Te kierowane zdarzenia przekazywania wymienione wcześniej dołączone zdarzenia, aby nadać im dostęp do modelu elementu ogólne w [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>Dołączone zdarzenia i zdarzenia element base kierowane udostępniać swoje dane zdarzeń i propagacji i tunelowania wersji kierowane zdarzenia również udostępniać dane zdarzenia.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Może to wpłynąć na obsługiwany właściwości zdarzenia, podczas przekazywania trasy zdarzenia.
